Package com.safenetinc.luna

Proprietary API for the LunaProvider (front end to Luna HSM).

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LunaAPI
    This class defines the JNI interface to the LunaAPI native library that is used to connect the JVM to the PKCS#11 cryptoki library.
    LunaCKAttribute
    Class to contain the type, value and length of an attribute.
    LunaHAStatus
    Contains information about the current HA status.
    LunaHAStatus.LunaMemberState
    Class to hold details of individual cluster members.
    LunaLogging
    A JSP logging framework utilizing the java.util.logging package built within any JVM
    LunaSession
    This class acts as an interface to sessions on the Luna HSM.
    LunaSessionManager
    LunaSessionManager is a collection of methods to make handling sessions easier.
    LunaSlotManager
    This class is used to manage access to SafeNet Luna hardware security modules (HSMs).
    LunaTokenObject
    An instance of this class represents an object stored on a Luna token.
    LunaUtils
    Various static utility methods
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LunaAPI.CKD
    Encapsulates the PKCS KDF values.
    LunaAPI.CKDHP
    Encapsulates the PKCS DH primitive values.
    LunaAPI.CKES
    Encapsulates the PKCS encryption scheme values.
    LunaAPI.CKMS
    Encapsulates the PKCS HMAC values.
    UserRole
    Enumerates the roles that a user can log in to a token with.

Package com.safenetinc.luna Description

Proprietary API for the LunaProvider (front end to Luna HSM). All com.safenetinc.luna.provider.* packages in the LunaProvider are considered JCA-compliant as they implement the JCA/JCE API in accordance with the conventions described by the "Java Cryptography Architecture (JCA) Reference Guide" in conjunction with "How to Implement a Provider in the Java Cryptography Architecture". The key to using this package effectively is to follow the JSP samples. If you discover that you need to use something and the samples don't cover it then please inform Gemalto Luna support of this shortcoming so we can resolve it for you. If you do contact support, perhaps a sample can be provided prior to any official release or patch.

See following table for brief summary of proprietary API classes and the typical methods used:
